actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that Members of the House of Representatives and certain employees of the House, except in certain cases, may not be reimbursed for the difference between the cost of first-class air travel accommodations and the cost of other air travel accommodations.

summary.text: Prohibits the reimbursement for travel expenses of Members of the House of Representatives and certain House employees for the difference between the cost of first-class air forces and regular forces except in specified cases.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that Members of the House of Representatives and certain employees of the House, except in certain cases, may not be reimbursed for the difference between the cost of first-class air travel accommodations and the cost of other air travel accommodations.
